department.description: The Vulnerable Children and Families team is responsible for services that support children and families who are vulnerable or at risk and social care services for children.

live.title: Early years child development training
live.description: Training for early years professionals to support early years child development.

department.description: The Customer Experience and Design team is responsible for ensuring that the Department for Education's services are designed to meet the needs of the public and other stakeholders.

explore.title: User experience score
explore.description: How we might measure user satisfaction consistently across service interactions.

alpha.title: Register of Services
alpha.description: A centralised register of all services provided by the Department for Education.

private-beta.title: Accessibility issues and statements service
private-beta.description: A service to allow users to record and monitor accessibility issues and generate realtime accessibility statements.

live.title: Design manual
live.description: A guide to the design principles and patterns used by the Department for Education.

live.title: Service assessment service
live.description: A service to allow users to record the level of compliance of a service to the GDS service standard.
